name BRIGHTNESS RED GREEN BLUE
{{e.name}} {{e.W}} {{e.PR}} {{e.PG}} {{e.PB}}

load
Go To Blue in 4
template:
entity_id: {{entity}}
Service: light.turn_on
transition: 0.2
end:
  brightness: 255
  hs_color:
    - 240
    - 100

name: Rainbow 10
template:
entity_id: {{entity}}
Service: light.turn_on
transition: 10
start:
  brightness: 64
  hs_color:
    - 60
    - 100
end:
  brightness: 64
  hs_color:
    - 333
    - 100
ease: Mirror
loop: 0
